something_you_did_other_reason_details: Additional email received 5 days after initial application sighting qualifications not mentioned in the application, which conflict with work history.
candidate_behaviour_what_to_improve: Application needs to contain all qualifications including reference to equivalency obtained. Work history needs to be clearer.
personal_statement_what_to_improve: Lack of insight into education in the UK. Passion for teaching languages to children not apparent.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Passion for teaching languages to children in the UK needs to be central.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Work history very unclear. Qualifications unclear.
qualifications_other_reason_details: No evidence of ECCTIS equivalency which would have been needed to be able to complete the qualifications in the email dated the 20th July.  Only refers to conversations with UCAS member of staff.
honesty_and_professionalism_other_reason: Discrepancies between work history, qualifications and additional email sent. References only relate to information given by candidate rather than own experience of candidate. Professional relationship unclear and second referee does not give full name. Serious concerns about honesty.
